price: 25 Votre Seigneur connaît parfaitement vos intentions. Si celles-ci sont pures, sachez qu’Il traitera avec la plus grande indulgence ceux qui ne cessent de revenir à Lui.
arabic: رَّبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا فِي نُفُوسِكُمۡۚ إِن تَكُونُواْ صَٰلِحِينَ فَإِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لِلۡأَوَّٰبِينَ غَفُورٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: rabbukum aʿlamu bimā fī nufūsikum in takūnū ṣāliḥīna fa-innahu kāna lil'awwābīna ghafūran
translations: to those who often turn (to Him)
